background.name: background
background.title: Color Background
background.description: Default application background color. Should be set to either html or body element.

accent.name: n_color_accent
accent.title: Color Accent
accent.description: Accent color. Used as primary button background, hero area background, and as a link color. This color provides accessible contrast when used for text on light background.

overlay.name: overlay
overlay.title: Color Overlay
overlay.description: Default overlay color. Use this to distinguish modal and popout layers from the layer underneath.
